body:
> Took a while for me to find the html formatted document, can you edit your top post please adding this link?
>
> https://go.googlesource.com/proposal/+/1487446b91599daa695905dc51a77d1bcc7086d8/design/16339-alias-decls.md

The above link was last updated on June 31, 2016. The latest version of the proposal (updated on July 18, 2016) is made available in the `design` directory of the [golang/proposal](https://github.com/golang/proposal) repository. Proposal documents are assigned file names containing the issue number of the original proposal, e.g. `golang/proposal/design/16339-alias-decls.md` for #16339.

https://github.com/golang/proposal/blob/master/design/16339-alias-decls.md
